channel.title: I need to know how to make people Mods/Admins ive tried for a long time
channel.description:
Title says all
Ive been trying to look for tutorials on how to make mods etc. and i couldnt find any so im down to asking questions can somebody please tell me how to make a person / Mod or Admin. I thought i may of have to go to the characters folder in the server source folder and if i change the person's name ie. Mystic Range i would change it to say - 2 which is staff. and then i look again after i saved its back to player rights =0 can somebody help me please a link to a tutorial would be a saviour.
Thanks The 007 Reaper

item.title: I need to know how to make people Mods/Admins ive tried for a long time
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

You go into the Character file, then double-click on the character you wan’t to modify. To make them have higher rights, you should change their playerRights to one of the following;

1 = Moderator

2 = Administrator

3 = Owner

The owner doesn’t necessarily have any powers over an Administrator but you can make them have more powers. Save the character file and you’re done. Make sure the player is logged out because if they are logged in and they log out in ordor to have the rights, their file will save and the rights will go back to the usual.

Read full topic
item.source: I need to know how to make people Mods/Admins ive tried for a long time

item.title: I need to know how to make people Mods/Admins ive tried for a long time
item.dc:creator: @The_007_Reaper The 007 Reaper
item.description:
@The_007_Reaper wrote:

It doesnt do that… it just says save. i press save, then i closed the window and nothing happend… Help more please?

The 007 Reaper[br][size=1]Posted on: May 25, 2007, 02:50:51 AM[/size][hr]oh wait a miniute[br][size=1]Posted on: May 25, 2007, 02:51:39 AM[/size][hr]It worked [ ISH ] it changed me so im no longer admin to the other kid admin =[

item.title: I need to know how to make people Mods/Admins ive tried for a long time
item.dc:creator: @moneymangmm moneymangmm
item.description:
@moneymangmm wrote:

when u change their right - 1 is mod 2 is admin and 3 is co-owner. When u do that click save, then when u click x on top u then click save or yes when it askes u if u want to save to archive hope it helps.

Read full topic
